channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Real-Time Security with Continuous Access Evaluation (CAE) comes to Azure DevOps】带有连续访问评估（CAE）的实时安全性用于Azure DevOps
item.description: 【We’re thrilled to announce that Continuous Access Evaluation (CAE) is now supported on Azure DevOps, bringing a new level of near real-time security enforcement to your development workflows. 🔐 What Is CAE?】我们很高兴地宣布，Azure Devops现在支持持续的访问评估（CAE），这为您的开发工作流程带来了新的近乎实时安全执行。 🔐什么是CAE？

item.title: 【mssql-python vs pyodbc: Benchmarking SQL Server Performance】MSSQL-PYTHON vs PYODBC：基准测试SQL Server性能
【Thoughts on creating a tracking pointer class, part 1: Concept art】关于创建跟踪指针类的想法，第1部分：概念艺术
item.description: 【Suppose you have a C++ object, and you want to be able to create a "tracking pointer" that points to the object and follows it as it moves. // Concept art - final product may differ in significant ways struct Widget : trackable_object<Widget> { ⟦ ... ⟧ }; Widget w; tracking_ptr<Widget> p(w); asse】假设您有一个C ++对象，并且您希望能够创建一个指向对象并在其移动时跟随它的“跟踪指针”。 //概念艺术 - 最终产品可能会在很大程度上有所不同。小部件W; tracking_ptr <Widget> p（w）; ASSE

item.title: 【July 2025 (version 1.103)】2025年7月（版本1.103）
item.description: 【Learn what is new in the Visual Studio Code July 2025 Release (1.103) Read the full article】了解2025年7月的“视觉工作室代码”中的新内容（1.103）阅读全文

item.title: 【Announcing GA of Bicep templates support for Microsoft Entra ID resources】宣布二头肌模板的GA支持Microsoft Entra ID资源
item.description: 【We’re thrilled to announce that Bicep templates for Microsoft Entra ID resources is generally available from July 29th, 2025. Bicep templates bring declarative infrastructure as code (IaC) capabilities to Microsoft Graph resources. This new capability will initially be available for core Microsoft Entra ID resources. Bicep templat】我们很高兴地宣布，Microsoft Entra ID资源的二头肌模板通常从2025年7月29日提供。二头肌模板将声明性的基础架构作为代码（IAC）功能带到Microsoft Graph Resources。最初，这种新功能将用于Microsoft Entra ID资源。二头肌神庙

item.title: 【Under what conditions could a Read­File or Write­File fail to transfer all of the bytes, and how do I detect that?】在什么条件下， ReadFile 或 writeFile 无法转移所有字节，我该如何检测？
item.description: 【A customer wanted to understand the conditions under which the Read­File and Write­File functions would fail to transfer all of the bytes, and how to detect that this has occurred. The obvious reason why the Read­File functions would fail to transfer all the bytes is if there aren't that man】客户想了解ReadFile和WriteFile功能无法传输所有字节的条件，以及如何检测发生这种情况。 ReadFile函数无法传输所有字节的明显原因是如果没有该字节

item.title: 【GPT-5 Now Available in Visual Studio】GPT-5现在在Visual Studio中可用
item.description: 【We’re excited to share that GPT-5, OpenAI’s latest frontier model, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot for Visual Studio. GPT-5 offers faster responses and even better performance for writing and understanding code. This release brings a new level of capability to】We’re excited to share that GPT-5, OpenAI’s latest frontier model, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot for Visual Studio. GPT-5 offers faster responses and even better performance for writing and understanding code. This release brings a new level of capability to

item.title: 【Hunting Living Secrets: Secret Validity Checks Arrive in GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps】狩猎生活秘密：秘密有效性检查到达Github Advance for Azure Devops
item.description: 【If you’ve ever waded through a swamp of secret scanning alerts wondering, “Which of these are actually dangerous right now?” — this enhancement is for you. Secret validity checks in GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps (and the standalone Secret Protection experience) add a high‑signa】如果您曾经涉足过一大堆秘密扫描警报的沼泽，他们想知道：“现在哪一个实际上是危险的？” - 这种增强是给您的。 github的Azure DevOps（以及独立的秘密保护体验）中的GitHub Advanced Securiti

item.title: 【Thoughts on creating a tracking pointer class, part 2: Using a std::list】关于创建跟踪指针类的想法，第2部分：使用 std :: List
item.description: 【Last time, we worked out how we want a proposed "tracking pointer" to work. Now we can try implementing it. One idea is to give each trackable object a list of all the tracking pointers that a】上次，我们弄清楚了如何希望提出的“跟踪指针”工作。现在我们可以尝试实施它。一个想法是给每个可跟踪的对象一个列表的所有跟踪指针的列表

item.title: 【.NET 10 Preview 7 is now available!】.NET 10预览7现在可用！
item.description: 【Today, we are excited to announce the seventh preview release of .NET 10 with enhancements across the .NET Runtime, SDK, libraries, C#, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and more. Check out the full release notes linked below and get started today. [cta-button align="center" text="Download .NET 10 Preview 7" url="https://get】今天，我们很高兴宣布.NET 10的第七次预览版本，并在.NET运行时，SDK，库，C＃，ASP.NET Core，Blazor，.Net Maui等增强功能。查看下面链接的完整发行说明，并立即开始。 [cta button align =“中心” text =“下载.net 10预览7” url =“ https：//获取
